dialogs.0-1: What type of dialog do you want to see?
dialogs.1-1: Okay, here you go. You have got only one option.
dialogs.2-1: So here you are - you can only go forward or backwards.
dialogs.2-2: Use the left and right arrow keys to navigate.
dialogs.3-1: Cool! Now you can navigate in dialogs, which don't have responses.
dialogs.4-2: But you can still go to the next option.
dialogs.5-1: Here you can choose to which of all dialogs you want to go to.
